entries.content:
‚úÖ Completed dropdown menu metallic theme makeover!

## Changes Made:

### 1. Menu Container Enhancement (header-dropdown.css)
- Replaced plain dark background with `var(--surface-metallic)` + `var(--metallic-shine)` gradient
- Enhanced backdrop blur from 10px ‚Üí 16px for premium glass effect
- Upgraded border to metallic theme: `rgba(122, 162, 247, 0.15)`
- Added stronger shadows: `var(--shadow-xl)` + outer glow `0 0 20px rgba(122, 162, 247, 0.12)`

### 2. Triangle Notch Connector
- Added `::before` pseudo-element: 8px triangle pointing up, positioned at right: 24px
- Added `::after` pseudo-element: Inner filled triangle with menu background color
- Creates visual anchor connecting dropdown to label
- Changed overflow from hidden ‚Üí visible to show triangle

### 3. Session Items Metallic Effects
- Added shine sweep `::before` pseudo-element (like header buttons)
- Gradient: `linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(122, 162, 247, 0.15), transparent)`
- Sweep animation: left -100% ‚Üí 100% on hover (0.4s ease)
- Hover: `var(--hover-overlay)` with shine effect
- Active: `var(--active-overlay)` + scale(0.99) press effect
- Made borders more subtle: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03)

### 4. Typography Enhancement
- Title: Used `var(--text-primary)`, added letter-spacing 0.2px
- Hover title: Text-shadow `0 0 8px rgba(122, 162, 247, 0.2)`
- Meta: Used `var(--text-muted)` with proper z-index above shine
- Smooth color transitions on hover

### 5. Loading/Empty/Error States
- Empty: Added üìú emoji icon, `var(--text-muted)` color
- Loading: Added ‚è≥ rotating emoji, `var(--text-secondary)` color
- Error: Added ‚ö†Ô∏è emoji with error glow, `var(--state-error)` color
- All states match metallic theme with proper spacing/typography

### 6. Production Ready
- Changed setTimeout from 5000ms ‚Üí 0ms in HeaderDropdown.js line 197
- Instant loading, no artificial delay

## Result:
Dropdown now feels like natural extension of header with:
‚úÖ Visual anchoring (triangle connector)
‚úÖ Metallic theme consistency (shine, gradients, glows)
‚úÖ Professional polish (glass morphism, depth, shadows)
‚úÖ Delightful interactions (hover sweeps, smooth transitions)
‚úÖ Production ready (instant loading)

üé® Updated header label to match dropdown's dark theme

Changed .header-dropdown-label background from:
- Old: `var(--metallic-surface, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05))` (lighter, fallback)
- New: `var(--surface-metallic)` + `var(--metallic-shine)` gradient

Also updated border to match dropdown:
- Old: `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)`
- New: `rgba(122, 162, 247, 0.15)`

Result: Label and dropdown now share identical dark metallic background - perfect visual unity!
